text: Huddersfield Town F.C. are an English football club. They started in 1908 and are based in Huddersfield, West Yorkshire. The club plays their home games at a stadium called the Kirklees Stadium. == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 First Division 22nd 2001/02 Second Division 6th 2002/03 Second Division 22nd 2003/04 Third Division 4th 2004/05 League One 9th 2005/06 League One 4th 2006/07 League One 15th 2007/08 League One 10th 2008/09 League One 9th === Former position === == References == Category:English football clubs Category:Huddersfield Category:1908 establishments in England Category:Organisations based in West Yorkshire
title: Huddersfield Town F.C.
